duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line customer support by assisting shoppers with questions, locating merchandise, and aiding in the check-out process.
Stock and display merchandise in accordance with company merchandising standards.
Unloading and sorting merchandise upon delivery arrival.
Cleaning spills, floors, shelves, displays, and bathrooms.
Report any illegal activity by customers or employees to Store Management.
Perform additional duties as assigned by Management or Supervisors.
